Header.title: What is a plant whisperer?
Header.paragraph: Set your space for summer with our new plant bundles, back-in-stock planters, and live & dried cut stems.

Services.name: Joy
Services.text: Every exposure to nature—from caring for plants to just sharing a space with organic elements—promotes a sense of peace and enhances overall wellbeing.

Services.name: Connection
Services.text: Relationships define the quality of your life. We’re here to nurture connections between people and plants and the places they both thrive.

Services.name: Growth
Services.text: A growth company is any company whose business generates significant positive cash flows or earnings, which increase at significantly faster rates but we believe in quality and deliver best possible products.

Services.name: Eco-Friendly
Services.text: Lively Root grows and ships its eco-friendly plants from its nursery in San Marcos, California, and developed a proprietary boxing and shipping system to make sure the greenery arrives to its customers as fresh

Services.name: Transparency
Services.text: Cultivating our spaces—both the places we inhabit and our internal realms, allows us to reflect, restore, and transform for the better.

Services.name: Communication

Testimonials.text: "A pine is any conifer in the genus Pinus  of the family Pinaceae. Pinus is the sole genus in the subfamily Pinoideae. The Plant List compiled by the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew and Missouri Botanica."
Testimonials.name: Pine

Testimonials.text: "Coca is any of the four cultivated plants in the family Erythroxylaceae, native to western South America. Coca is known for its psychoactive alkaloid, cocaine."
Testimonials.name: Coca

Testimonials.text: "A botanical name is a formal scientific name conforming to the International Code of Nomenclature for algae, fungi, and plants (ICN) and, if it concerns a plant cultigen, the additional cultivar or Group epithets must conform to the International Code of Nomenclature for Cultivated Plants (ICNCP)."
Testimonials.name: Botanical

Testimonials.name: Coconut

Testimonials.text: "Amaranth: From the Greek word for “unfading,” Amaranth are grain-producing plants that have flowers and foliage in a range of colors from reds and purples to golds and greens."
Testimonials.name: Amaranth

Testimonials.text: "Ash: The common English name for the ash tree derives from the Old English æsc, which means “spear.” If you’re looking for something a little softer, Ashley means “ash tree clearing.”"
Testimonials.name: Ash
